A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie obviously has some cool scenes and some decent space action. The problem is\, the movie wasn’t even close to living up to the hype. This movie could’ve been so great\, showing training for Jedi and sith\, explaining snooke\, diving into the knights of Ren\, better light saber fight\, and so much but they didn’t do any of this. The “training” is a joke\, Luke’s greatest moment turned into being something lame\, questions were kinda answered in a really lame and lazy way\, no clue where snooke came from and they just had other characters doing busy work instead of just embracing that this story is about Luke and passing the torch. It’s a fine movie\, just reallyyyyy disappointed as a die hard fan
